org.corfudb.runtime.smr

Class TransactionalContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.smr.TransactionalContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class TransactionalContext
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    This class implements the thread-local transactional context used for determining whether or not an object is part of a transaction. Created by mwei on 5/28/15.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ThreadLocal<ITransaction> currentTX
      The currently executing transaction on this thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransactionalContext(ISMREngine engine, ITimestamp ts, CorfuDBRuntime cdr)
      Create a new local transactional context.
      TransactionalContext(ITransaction transaction)
      Create a new transactional context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this transactional context, releasing the currentTX held by the thread local.
      ITransaction getTX()
      Get the currently executing transaction.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • currentTX

        public static ThreadLocal<ITransaction> currentTX
        The currently executing transaction on this thread.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransactionalContext

        public TransactionalContext(ITransaction transaction)
        Create a new transactional context.
        Parameters:
        transaction - The transaction to execute this context under.

      • TransactionalContext

        public TransactionalContext(ISMREngine engine,
                            ITimestamp ts,
                            CorfuDBRuntime cdr)
        Create a new local transactional context.
        Parameters:
        engine - The engine to redirect updates to.
        ts - The timestamp this context occurs at.
        cdr - The CorfuDBRuntime to pass through.
